description:
Van Lindberg


Van Lindberg is an open source lawyer and software developer. He has been involved with Python since 1998, and spent from 2008-2023 chairing PyCon US, chairing the Python Software Foundation, or serving as the PSFâ€™s general counsel. Since then, he has been heavily involved in the development of AI law, including arguing for the copyrightability of the first AI-generated images submitted for registration to the US Copyright Office.


Social Networks:

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vanlindberg/
X: https://x.com/VanL

More About PyCon Colombia at http://www.pycon.co
title: Keynote - Van Lindberg
